text: Making a goodwill visit, two Bangladeshi Coast Guard (BCGS) ships arrived to the country today (25th October).'BCGS Syed Nazrul' and 'BCGS Tajuddin' were accorded a traditional naval welcome by the Sri Lanka Navy upon their arrival at the Colombo harbor.The ships will remain in the island until Thursday (27th October).
title: Bangladesh Coast Guard Ships arrive in Colombo
